```{r Question 3}

q3var <- rnorm(1000, 0, 1)
q3var2 <- rnorm (1000,0,1)
q3lm <- lm(q3var ~ q3var2)
summary(q3lm)

z.score <- rep(NA, 100)
for(k in 1:100){
var1 <- rnorm(1000, 0, 1)
var2 <- rnorm(1000, 0, 1)
fit <- lm(var2 ~ var1)
z.score[k] <- coef(fit)[2] / coef(summary(fit))[2,2]
}

```
